title: Career Goals & Vision
description: Where you see yourself heading in your career and life

questions.question: What's your primary career goal for the next 2-3 years?

options.label: Land my first professional role in a field I care about
Grow into a more senior or experienced position
Explore or switch to a different field or industry
Move into a leadership or management position
Become a recognized specialist or expert in my area
Start my own business or venture
Find stable employment with steady growth

questions.question: In 5-10 years, which career path appeals to you most?

options.label: Expert/Specialist - becoming a top authority in my field
Team Leader - guiding and managing teams
Director/Executive - shaping organizational strategy
Entrepreneur - building my own business or organization
Consultant/Advisor - working independently with diverse clients
Educator/Mentor - teaching and developing others
Researcher - advancing knowledge in my area of interest
Creative professional - producing original work or content
Not sure yet - still exploring what fits me best

questions.question: What does career success mean to you? (Select up to 4)

options.label: High income and financial rewards
Deep expertise and mastery in my field
Making a meaningful impact on people or society
Healthy work-life balance
Professional recognition and reputation
Building and leading great teams
Driving innovation and new ideas
Financial freedom and independence
Continuous learning and personal growth
Autonomy and freedom in how I work

questions.question: How important is climbing the career ladder (titles, promotions) to you?
questions.minLabel: Not important - I care about the work itself
questions.maxLabel: Very important - I'm driven by advancement

questions.question: What type of organization do you want to work for long-term?

options.label: Large, prestigious organization - resources, reputation, stability
High-growth startup - fast pace, equity potential, big opportunity
Early-stage startup - build from scratch, high impact
Mid-size company - balance of stability and agility
NGO or non-profit - mission-driven, social impact
Government or public sector - serving the public interest
My own business - full control and independence
Freelance or consulting - variety and flexibility

questions.question: Do you see yourself staying hands-on in your craft or moving into management?
questions.minLabel: I want to move into management and lead people
questions.maxLabel: I want to stay hands-on and deepen my expertise

questions.question: What skills or abilities do you want to develop in the next 1-2 years? (Select up to 5)

options.label: Leadership and people management
Communication and presentation skills
Strategic thinking and planning
Data analysis and decision-making
Creative and design skills
Business and commercial awareness
Deep knowledge in a specific industry or field
Mentorship and coaching abilities
Digital tools and technical literacy

questions.question: Describe your ideal role 5 years from now. What are you doing, what have you accomplished, and how does it feel?
questions.placeholder: e.g., Leading a small team at an international organization, running my own business, advising companies as an expert consultant...

questions.question: How willing are you to relocate for career opportunities?
questions.minLabel: Not willing - I want to stay where I am or work remotely
questions.maxLabel: Very willing - I'd move anywhere for the right opportunity

questions.question: What would make you feel like you've 'made it' in your career?

options.label: Reaching a senior or leadership position
Achieving a specific income or financial goal
Making a visible difference in people's lives
Leading a successful team or organization
Being recognized as an expert or thought leader
Achieving financial independence
Running my own successful business or venture
Having meaningful work with a balanced, fulfilling life

questions.question: How important is being in a major professional hub or city for your career?
questions.minLabel: Not important - I can build my career anywhere
questions.maxLabel: Very important - I want to be where the opportunities are

questions.question: If you could skip ahead and have any career or role right now, what would it be and why?
questions.placeholder: Dream big - what role, organization, or lifestyle would make you happiest?
